EmailTemplate.name: 201805_Global_Email_FlightBagPro_v1.5_mih.201805_Global_Email_FlightBagPro_v1.5_
EmailTemplate.subject: File eAPIS Manifests in GoDirect Flight Bag Pro v1.5
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/godirect%E2%84%A2-flight-bag-pro]]> Pilots can now create and submit Electronic Advance Passenger Information System (eAPIS) manifests for flights departing or arriving the United States.
- Create and manage crew and passenger manifests and the necessary documentation.
- Update and re-submit manifests if crew or passenger information changes.
DOWNLOAD TO GET STARTED <[[https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/godirect-flight-bag-pro/id1232722107?ls=1&mt=8]]> NEED ASSISTANCE?
Our Honeywell Flight Services representatives can assist you and your flight department with getting this latest version ready to go. Contact our team - we are here to help.
Email: FlightServices@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:FlightServices@Honeywell.com]]> US Toll-Free: (888) 634-3330 International: +1 (602) 365-7020
